name: Finger soccer kick: 2018 WC
description:
Finger soccer kick: 2018 WC is much fun to and enjoyable. Hit the ball with fingers , avoid opponent players, they may be experienced goalkeepers and solid defense, they can also stop your free kick! But just make the goals make you feel proud to be football world cup winning team.
Features:
- A Soccer Free Kick game with simple rules
- There are no limits on gems and coins. Play as much as you want!
- You can play without internet connection.
